title: Judge Tosses out Lawsuit Aimed at Keeping Reps. Gosar, Biggs off Ballots

sentence: The plaintiffs in the case, the group Free Speech for the People (more irony), are trying to use Section 3 of the 14th Amendment to the Constitution, which prohibits elected officials from engaging in an insurrection or rebellion to knock Rep. Paul Gosar (R-AZ), Rep. Andy Biggs (R-AZ) and state Rep. Mark Finchem (who’s running for Secretary of State) off the ballot in Arizona.
author: Nick Arama
title: Effort to Block GOP Reps From Running Because of Jan. 6 Goes Down to Withering Defeat
